text: Light-winged Smoke, Icarian bird, Melting thy pinions in thy upward flight,
Melting thy pinions in thy upward flight, Lark without song, and messenger of dawn
Lark without song, and messenger of dawn%% Circling above the hamlets as they nest;
Circling above the hamlets as they nest; Or else, departing dream, and shadowy form
Or else, departing dream, and shadowy form%% Of midnight vision, gathering up thy skirts;
Of midnight vision, gathering up thy skirts; By night star-veiling, and by day
By night star-veiling, and by day%% Darkening the light and blotting out the sun;
Darkening the light and blotting out the sun; Go thou my incense upward from this hearth,
Go thou my incense upward from this hearth, And ask the gods to pardon this clear flame.
